entries.title: Sr. Product Designer
entries.description: [See new language around MP on WR] I work with high-performing teams to make interfaces that empower the workplace and engage users. I'm a Designer/Developer at Myplanet where process and values are grounded in the principle of empathy-for-all and emphasize collaboration, flexibility, and humanity. As an early hire, I've seen the culture adapt and grow in an ever-changing tech landscape of the unknown. Self-awareness and empathy are at the core of both my journey, and Myplanet's.
entries.callout: For the past 9 years, I've been growing alongside Myplanet, defining new ways of learning through UI Development and front-end polish.

entries.title: Mindfulness Fascilitator
entries.description: Mindfulness has been a supporting pillar in my growth and in the evolution of Myplanet; we create a space for individuals to learn and grow.
entries.callout: I'm one of many day-to-day mindfulness ambassador promoting good-vibes and fostering emotional intelligence on multi-disciplinary teams.

entries.title: UI Designer
entries.description: A unique learning opportunity for students, recent graduates and those looking to re-train.

entries.title: Design Intern
entries.description: This is where I learned the magic of photoshop
